thread.title: 'Tower of Terror' Movie Reboot Planned at Disney

title: 'Tower of Terror' Movie Reboot Planned at Disney
text:
Published By: MovieWeb.com: Movie News - Today 
Disney is seeking a writer for 'Tower of Terror', based on the hit theme park attraction, with John August providing the treatment....
